name: Ludumium
description:
Fullscreen recommended as the cursor is massive in the WebGL build for some reason.

It's your first day at Ludum Laboratories and you must get to work combining chemicals and dispensing them into the tray for the researchers. Unfortunately, the table is made of Bohrium, formerly known as Unnilseptium (an Uns-table, if you will), a highly reactive element that no chemical should ever touch. You are allocated 61 seconds to complete each task.

Can you survive long enough to complete the final challenge of concocting the ultimate chemical - Ludumium?

CONTROLS

Left Click - Grab object

Mouse - Move object

Q/E or Scroll Wheel - Rotate object

R - Restart

Escape - Quit to main menu

F1 - Toggle Fullscreen (Not available in browser, use the button)

CREDITS
